notes: [Added] Added direct support for processing Commerce Order elements via `orders` and `orderIds` commands.
[Added] Added `completed`, `isPaid`, `isUnPaid`, and `orderStatusId` params for filtering Commerce Order elements.
[Improved] Added `size` as a criteria option in the Walk CLI command.
[Improved] Added `status` as criteria option in the Walk CLI command, enabling commands/counts to be performed on elements with non-open statuses.
[Improved] Notices are logged as Profile-level so they won't clog up the logs with superfluous stack traces.
[Improved] Added `relatedTo` as a criteria option in the Walk CLI command.
[Improved] Walk now summons Max Power when performing potentially intense operations, i.e. when spawning Tasks and when finding elements.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where spawnTasks() only worked correctly with Elements or numeric items, rather than with any old array item as promised in the readme.
